Class OgmMassIndexerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.massindex.impl.OgmMassIndexerFactory

    public class OgmMassIndexerFactory
extends Object
implements org.hibernate.search.batchindexing.spi.MassIndexerFactory
    MassIndexerFactory that can be used to register the OgmMassIndexer to Hibernate Search.
    Author:
    Davide D'Alto <davide@hibernate.org>
